caller_intent: Derek needs assistance with making a payment to Liberty Mutual using cash he plans to deposit, and he is concerned about whether paying on Monday will be acceptable given the original due date of the 19th.
resolution_steps: Anna confirms the payment due date was the 19th and acknowledges Derek's intention to pay on Monday.
Anna explains there is no explicit information about the last acceptable payment date before cancellation but advises paying by Monday at the latest.
Anna offers to set a reminder to call Derek on Monday at 11:00 AM to confirm the payment.
Derek agrees to the plan and confirms he will make the deposit on Monday.
knowledge_required: Understanding of Liberty Mutual's payment policies and grace periods
Ability to set internal reminders or notes for follow-up calls
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance's internal note-taking or reminder system
summary: Anna assists Derek with a Liberty Mutual payment issue, advising him to pay by Monday and setting a reminder to follow up on the payment. Derek agrees to the plan and confirms he will deposit the cash on Monday.
